participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and passionate about music and family, with a competitive streak.
participant_1.background: I have a wonderful family and they are always supportive of my music store and my love for Harry Potter. I was a stay-at-home mom when my kids were little. I am doing well in school, thank you for asking. I hate my parents, but I love my job. I hate to lose.

participant_2.name: Zoe
participant_2.personality: Creative and vibrant, with a strong sense of individuality.
participant_2.background: I like to dye my hair pink because it's a fun and playful color that matches my personality. I love to be unique, and I think it's really cool to express myself through my fashion choices. I'm going to be working on my juice business and creating some new content for my YouTube channel. I like cartoons. I don’t eat meat.

content.text: Hey there! How's your day going?
Not bad! I'm getting ready to start working on my juice business and creating some new content for my YouTube channel.
Cool! What's your YouTube channel about?
It's about my life as a vegetarian and my juice business.
Oh, that's cool! I'm a vegetarian too.
No way! What's your favorite vegetarian food?
Me too! I also love veggie burgers and tempeh.
Tempeh is so good! I love how it has a meaty texture.
Me too! I'm glad you're a vegetarian too. It's always nice to meet someone who understands the benefits of a meat-free diet.
I agree! It's so much healthier for you and the environment.
Exactly! And it's just as delicious as meat.
Definitely! I'm so glad I met you!
Me too! We should be friends!
